biography.value: Scouts are skilled hunters and trackers who offer their services for a fee. Most hunt wild game, but a few work as bounty hunters, serve as guides, or provide military reconnaissance.

details.environment: Arctic, Coastal, Desert, Forest, Grassland, Hill, Mountain, Swamp, Underdark

habitat.custom: Arctic, Coastal, Desert, Forest, Grassland, Hill, Mountain, Swamp, Underdark

description.value: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Keen Hearing and Sight. The scout has advantage on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
